long_description: Designed to let your baby recline in comfort, the Thule Stroller Infant Sling accessory gives lateral support while providing maximum stability. Hammocklike design helps provide a smooth ride and makes it possible for the baby to recline while still being able to look around and see the world. Leaves plenty of room for a second, older child in the 2-seat carrier models. Attaches securely to all Thule strollers. The Thule Stroller Infant Sling is made for babies 1 -10 months old and includes mounting hardware.
short_description: Designed to let your baby recline in comfort, the Thule Stroller Infant Sling accessory gives lateral support while providing maximum stability.
